item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, December 21, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:

6. Is stuff online worth saving? (71 points | 75 comments)

28. A Gentle Introduction to Graph Neural Networks (2021) (348 points | 31 comments)
29. A 10-Year Battery for AirTag (664 points | 551 comments)
30. The Parker Solar Probe will make its closest approach yet to the Sun (160 points | 132 comments)
